results.title: Ada's story
results.creator_credit: Ada Peterson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Ada Peterson’s brother received a call twelve years ago from a person they didn’t know. It was their sister, Rhonda, who was taken as a child, a member of what is now known as the stolen generation. After getting over the initial shock and apprehension, getting to know Rhonda and her story has taken Ada’s life in a different direction, bringing her closer to celebrating who she is.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Ada Peterson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Ada Peterson’s brother received a call twelve years ago from a person they didn’t know. results.title: Stories from the Turkish community : Digital Storytelling project
results.creator_credit: Ifran Hassan, Mustafa Yucel, Umit Ugur, Bayram Ocal, Yusuf Hazar, Figen Hasimoglu, Memet Gunes, Riza Guclu, Huseyin Duman, Fatma Coskun, Kenan Besiroglu, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Eleven Turkish migrants, from Cyprus and Turkey, tell of their experiences migrating and making Australia their new home. They tell of the reasons for moving here, the journey to Australia and share their feelings for their family, their community and their adopted country.
results.title_for_label: Stories from the Turkish community : Digital Storytelling project

results.title: Yeni hayat = New life
results.creator_credit: Kenan Besiroglu, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Kenan Besiroglu migrated to Australia with his wife and son in 1970. This is a story of hard work, perseverance and the promise of a new life.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Kenan Besiroglu, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Yeni dunyam = My new world
results.creator_credit: Yusuf Hazar, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Migrating to Australia from Ankara, Turkey in 1978, Yusuf Hazar fondly looks back on the life he and his wife created for his six children. Feeling a deep sense of gratitude to his adopted country, Yusuf and his family are committed to helping out others in the community.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Yusuf Hazar, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: New life new country
results.creator_credit: Fatma Coskun, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Fatma Coskun came from a small village amongst the mountains of Corun. However, financial hardships drove her and her husband to Australia to start a new life. Despite a major setback at the beginning of their journey, Fatma and her family consider themselves very fortunate to have settled in Australia.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Fatma Coskun, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: My second home
results.creator_credit: Memet Gunes, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Memet Gunes was one of the lucky few people in his village in Turkey to receive an education. When he migrated to Australia with his family he found a place full of possibility and opportunity.

results.title: Ithal Damat = Imported groom
results.creator_credit: Huseyin Duman, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Huseyin Damat left Turkey for Australia to meet and marry his wife. Although he was sad to leave his family behind, his journey here was an eventful one, especially when he discovered he was on the same flight as Swedish super group ABBA.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Huseyin Duman, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Huseyin Damat left Turkey for Australia to meet and marry his wife. Although he was sad to leave his family behind, his journey here was an eventful one, especially when he discovered he was on the same flight as Swedish super group ABBA.

results.title: Home away from home
results.creator_credit: Umit Ugur, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Unlike other immigrants, Umit Ugur didn’t move to Australia in 1981 for economic reasons, instead he migrated here because of love.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Umit Ugur, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: From a small island to a giant continent : the story of a Cypriot Turk
results.creator_credit: Ifran Hassan, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Ifran Hassan recalls leaving his homeland of Cyprus in 1970 to escape the troubled political climate, his destination, Melbourne where he set out to make a new life for himself and to help improve the lives of others.
results.title_for_label: From a small island to a giant continent : the story of a Cypriot Turk
results.creator_credit_for_label: Ifran Hassan, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
